input.activity_signal: Company website found via web search (advancecommunications.com) showing active 24-hour answering service operations. Multiple business profile listings found on RocketReach, BBB, and Datanyze indicating ongoing business presence. Tampa, FL location mentioned in akama.com listing matches FCC filing address.
input.product_summary: Advanced Communications is a telecommunications firm providing IP phone systems, VoIP services, structured cabling, data networking, and cloud services primarily to small and mid-size businesses.
